mapper.select: select * from consult order by state,createTime desc limit #{start},#{number}

SELECT COUNT(id) number FROM consult WHERE 1=1
and id=#{id}
and name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{name},'%'))
and phoneNumber like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{phoneNumber},'%'))
and createTime >= CONCAT(#{createTime},' 00:00:00') AND createTime <= CONCAT(#{createTime},' 23:59:59')
SELECT attribution, COUNT(id) number FROM consult GROUP BY attribution ORDER BY number DESC
mapper.update: update consult set name=#{name}, createTime=#{createTime},phoneNumber=#{phoneNumber},attribution=#{attribution} where id=#{id}
update consult set state=#{state} where id=#{id}
